title: Spirit animal: Raccoon gets drunk as a skunk in a booze store - and sleeps off hangover in the toilet
description: Officials say the raccoon was taken into custody and allowed to sleep for a few hours before being released into the wild - presumably with a headache.
content:
A raccoon has gotten as drunk as a skunk.
On a wild Friday night, the animal broke into a liquor store in Virginia - and began helping itself to the stock.
The following morning, an officer was asked to investigate reports of a break-in… and wasn't p... [1318 chars]

title: 'No justice' over Hillsborough and 'Holly's guilt over crash'
description: Wednesday's front pages focus on the Hillsborough disaster report and the fine given to TV presenter Holly Willoughby for driving without due care.
content:

title: Trump news at a glance: Hegseth scrutinized over boat strikes as first formal complaint filed by victim’s family
description: Trump says any country he believes is making drugs destined illegally for the US is vulnerable to military attack – key US politics stories from Tuesday, 2 December 2025
content: A deadly US strike on an alleged drug vessel has triggered bipartisan anger in Washington as lawmakers question whether the double-tap attack, which killed survivors of an initial strike, may amount to a war crime. The Pentagon and members of the Tru... [623 chars]

title: 'Carspreading’ is on the rise
description: In the UK and across Europe, cars are becoming longer, wider and heavier.
content:

title: Nike, Superdry and Lacoste ads banned in UK over ‘misleading’ green claims
description: Advertising watchdog says all three firms misled shoppers by using term ‘sustainable’ in paid-for Google adverts
content:
Ads for Nike, Superdry and Lacoste have been banned in the UK for misleading consumers about the environmental sustainability credentials of their products.
The Advertising Standards Authority (ASA) said paid-for Google ads run by all three retailers... [2759 chars]
